title: What font?
content:
Hi! can anyone tell me what font that is? Many thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223821im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/what_type_6349.jpg)

 [‹ Type ID from MTV VMA 06](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223821/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41311 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223821/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41270 "Go to next forum topic")
author: schmauseline

comments.content:
I think this looks like [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223821/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/vag-rounded/) that someone has ’stroked’ or outlined to death (or until all the counters were filled).

- Mike Yanega

Well, who’d have thought of that? what a brilliant idea! I hope we see a lot more of this type of thing.

Nick Cooke
